Uses of Class
io.vertx.core.dns.impl.netty.DnsResponse

  • Packages that use DnsResponse 
    Package Description
    io.vertx.core.dns.impl.netty  
    io.vertx.core.dns.impl.netty.decoder
    Handles the decoding of DNS response packets.

    • Uses of DnsResponse in io.vertx.core.dns.impl.netty

      Methods in io.vertx.core.dns.impl.netty that return DnsResponse 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DnsResponse DnsResponse.copy()
      Returns a deep copy of this DNS response.
      protected static DnsResponse DnsResponseDecoder.decodeResponse(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf buf, io.netty.buffer.ByteBufAllocator allocator)
      Decodes a full DNS response packet.
      DnsResponse DnsResponse.retain() 
      DnsResponse DnsResponse.retain(int increment) 

    • Uses of DnsResponse in io.vertx.core.dns.impl.netty.decoder

      Methods in io.vertx.core.dns.impl.netty.decoder with parameters of type DnsResponse 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T RecordDecoder.decode(DnsResponse response, DnsResource resource)
      Returns a generic type T defined in a class implementing RecordDecoder after decoding a resource record when given a DNS response packet.
      StartOfAuthorityRecord StartOfAuthorityDecoder.decode(DnsResponse response, DnsResource resource)
      Returns a decoded SOA (start of authority) resource record, stored as an instance of StartOfAuthorityRecord.
      MailExchangerRecord MailExchangerDecoder.decode(DnsResponse response, DnsResource resource)
      Returns a decoded MX (mail exchanger) resource record, stored as an instance of MailExchangerRecord.
      ServiceRecord ServiceDecoder.decode(DnsResponse response, DnsResource resource)
      Returns a decoded SRV (service) resource record, stored as an instance of ServiceRecord.
      List<String> TextDecoder.decode(DnsResponse response, DnsResource resource)
      Returns a decoded TXT (text) resource record, stored as an ArrayList of Strings.
      String DomainDecoder.decode(DnsResponse response, DnsResource resource)
      Returns the decoded domain name for a resource record.
      InetAddress AddressDecoder.decode(DnsResponse response, DnsResource resource)
      Returns an InetAddress containing a decoded address from either an A or AAAA resource record.
      <T> T RecordDecoderFactory.decode(int type, DnsResponse response, DnsResource resource)
      Decodes a resource record and returns the result.
